name: asSys.js
description: An Agent-Skills (i.e. Entity-Attribute) System JavaScript library.

scripts.test: rm -f as-sys.js as-sys.min.js as-sys.js.zip && uglifyjs src/asSys.js -b indent-level=2 -o as-sys.js && vows && echo && bin/uglify as-sys.js > as-sys.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm test && chmod a-w as-sys.js as-sys.min.js && zip as-sys.js.zip LICENSE as-sys.js as-sys.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." ${VERSION} && git push --tags
